title.rendered: Volgograd International Airport Contact & Code -Volgograd, Russia

content.rendered:
Volgograd International Airport in Volgograd, Russia Contact Address, Phone number, Email, Location Map, Website

Volgograd International Airport in Volgograd, Russia

Airport Name : Volgograd International Airport

ICAO Code :Urww

IATA Code : Vog

Address: Sh. Aviatorov, 161, Volgogradskaya Oblast, Russia, 400036

Phone: +7 844 226-10-87

Business hours :

Fax:

Email:

Map: View direction here

Volgograd International Airport Website: http://xn-80aafeah9bwaabcgldgz5p.xn-p1ai/

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Volgograd International Airport in Volgograd, Russia Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Volgograd International Airport in Volgograd, Russia: (click on the stars below)
